TopicTitle: Where to next? And thank you!

Articles.Content:
Hey its L3GO here after being overseas for the past 2 weeks without internet and come back and see my KSP news video have 907 views has taken my breath away and i thank those who watched it.

The problem is that i want to do a series of something like more news episodes Lets plays or big explosion montages but what content would be better? If i keep doing news there will be weeks where its just dead silent with little being told.

Anyway what should i do??

(Sorry if its in the wrong place)
IDK, maybe an extensive test run of 0.25's new features?

IDK, maybe an extensive test run of 0.25's new features?

I like this idea. It's one thing to see a preview of the features from the edit time, but a post release review could be more informative.

I like this idea. It's one thing to see a preview of the features from the edit time, but a post release review could be more informative.

Thats not a bad idea. But you need to get in before any other youtuber does if you get what i mean. Making something that summarises and shows you what it is compared to taking it and making something great out of it is the hardest part.
I would like a Jool V Grand Tour News report thing.
Or, if you're into mission replicas, you could try making a Mars Direct video.
